uniol.apt.io.renderer

Interface Renderer<G>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - Type of object that the renderer consumes.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRenderer, AbstractSTRenderer, AptLTSRenderer, AptPNRenderer, BagginsPNRenderer, DotLTSRenderer, DotPNRenderer, GenetPNRenderer, LoLAPNRenderer, PetrifyLTSRenderer, PetrifyPNRenderer, PnmlPNRenderer, SynetLTSRenderer, SynetPNRenderer, TikzLTSRenderer, TikzPNRenderer

    public interface Renderer<G>
    Interface for generic renderers.
    Author:
    vsp

      • renderFile

        void renderFile(G obj,
                java.lang.String filename)
         throws RenderException,
                java.io.IOException
        Render an object into a file
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to render
        filename - the name of the desired output file
        Throws:
        RenderException - if the renderer can't describe the object
        java.io.IOException - if writing failes

                 throws RenderException
        Render an object into a string
